products.name: Space Marine
products.description: A genetically enhanced super-soldier, clad in power armor and armed with advanced weaponry.

products.name: Elf Warrior
products.description: A fierce and agile combatant, the elf warrior moves with unmatched grace and precision.

products.name: British Rifleman
products.description: A WWII British rifleman was a frontline infantry soldier equipped with a Lee-Enfield bolt-action rifle, known for its reliability and rapid rate of fire.

products.name: Sherman Tank
products.description: The M4 Sherman was the primary medium tank used by the United States and its Allies during World War II.
